nl.inl.blacklab.search

Interface BlackLabIndex

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlackLabIndexWriter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlackLabIndexImpl, MockBlackLabIndex

    public interface BlackLabIndex
extends Closeable

        Does the specified directory contain a BlackLab index?
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Find hits for a pattern in a field.

        the hits found

                  org.apache.lucene.search.Query filter,
                  SearchSettings settings)
           throws InvalidQuery
        Find hits for a pattern in a field.
        Parameters:
        queryInfo - information about the query: field, logger
        pattern - the pattern to find
        filter - determines which documents to search
        settings - search settings, or null for default

        the hits found

        WildcardTermTooBroad - if a wildcard or regular expression term is overly broad

      • termFrequencies

        TermFrequencyList termFrequencies(AnnotationSensitivity annotSensitivity,
                                  org.apache.lucene.search.Query filterQuery,
                                  Set<String> terms)
        Determine the term frequencies for an annotation sensitivity.
        Parameters:
        annotSensitivity - the annation + sensitivity indexing we want the term frequency for
        filterQuery - document filter, or null for all documents
        terms - a list of terms to retrieve frequencies for, or null/empty to retrieve frequencies for all terms
        Returns:
        term frequencies

      • explain

        default QueryExplanation explain(QueryInfo queryInfo,
                                 TextPattern pattern,
                                 org.apache.lucene.search.Query filter)
                          throws InvalidQuery
        Explain how a TextPattern is converted to a SpanQuery and rewritten to an optimized version to be executed by Lucene.
        Parameters:
        queryInfo - query info, such as the field to search
        pattern - the pattern to explain
        filter - filter query, or null for none
        field - which field to find the pattern in
        Returns:
        the explanation
        Throws:
        WildcardTermTooBroad - if a wildcard or regular expression term is overly broad
        InvalidQuery

        useCache - whether to use the cache or bypass it
        searchLogger - where to log details about how the search was executed, or null to skip this logging

        empty search object

      • annotationForwardIndex

        AnnotationForwardIndex annotationForwardIndex(Annotation annotation)
        Tries to get the ForwardIndex object for the specified fieldname. Looks for an already-opened forward index first. If none is found, and if we're in "create index" mode, may create a new forward index. Otherwise, looks for an existing forward index and opens that.
        Parameters:
        annotation - the annotation for which we want the forward index
        Returns:
        the ForwardIndex if found/created
        Throws:
        BlackLabRuntimeException - if the annotation has no forward index

      • forwardIndex

        ForwardIndex forwardIndex(AnnotatedField field)
        Get forward index for the specified annotated field.
        Parameters:
        field - field to get forward index for
        Returns:
        forward index

        String name()
        Get the index name. Usually the name of the directory the index is in.
        Returns:
        index name

        Set how to fix well-formedness for snippets of XML.
        Parameters:
        strategy - the setting: either adding or removing unbalanced tags

      • setCollator

        void setCollator(Collator collator)
        Set the collator used for sorting. The default collator is for English.
        Parameters:
        collator - the collator

      • setDefaultMatchSensitivity

        void setDefaultMatchSensitivity(MatchSensitivity m)
        Set the default sensitivity for queries.
        Parameters:
        m - default match sensitivity

      • setSearchSettings

        void setSearchSettings(SearchSettings settings)
        Set the maximum number of hits to process/count.
        Parameters:
        settings - desired settings

      • setDefaultContextSize

        void setDefaultContextSize(ContextSize size)
        Set the default context size.
        Parameters:
        size - default context size

      • setCache

        void setCache(SearchCache cache)
        Set the object BlackLab should use as cache. BlackLab will notify the cache of search results and will ask the cache for results before executing a search. It is up to the application to implement an effective cache, deciding whether to cache a result and ensuring the cache doesn't grow too large.
        Parameters:
        cache - cache object to use

      • cache

        SearchCache cache()

      • blackLab

        BlackLabEngine blackLab()
        Get the BlackLab instance that created us.
        Returns:
        BlackLab instance
